Text: O̩la ku Habakuk, akache̩, li de̩.
O Jihofa, gbogbo wʼe̩gba oñ nakwadʼe̩,
E̩wñ chi kʼuwe̩ adʼe̩wñ ibe̩te̩ ña mi
Me̩ go ef abo uche̩ichi abo uche̩ichi ku me̩ li;
Todu go, omi akʼabo Kaldia kwane̩ me̩,
O̩chaka-ma awa ku ma chʼe̩wñ akpulu;
Taku ma lale fuu dab afu alo-ma waa,
Uwe̩ kʼeju-we̩ chefe̩ tʼe̩wñ e̩bie̩ne̩ ego le
Todu e̩ che kʼamone̩ ki dab ame̩ja ohimini abadi,
Todule̩ ma akpʼe̩wñ e̩bie̩ ñw e̩hia-ma
Todule̩ ma ñʼawe ekʼe̩wñ ki jʼef e̩hia-ma dajane̩ alo waa,
